sections.heading: institution, defined.Financial institution shall mean a state or federally chartered bank, a capital stock state building and loan association, a capital stock federal savings and loan association, a capital stock federal savings bank, and a capital stock state savings bank

sections.text:
18-2707.Financial institution, defined.

Financial institution shall mean a state or federally chartered bank, a capital stock state building and loan association, a capital stock federal savings and loan association, a capital stock federal savings bank, and a capital stock state savings bank.

SourceLaws 1991, LB 840, ยง 8;Laws 2003, LB 131, ยง 21.
